page.title: 02Clubs
page.content: There are 18 clubs in Burley.They are Burley Wives,Scouts,Cubs,The Flower Club,Cricket Club,Golf,Art,Working Mens'Club,Play Group,Tennis,Brownies, Football Club,Discorama,Burley Primary Association,Red Cross,The Garden Club. ,Youth Club and the WI Club. All these Clubs are in Burley.The Working Mens' Club is a pub, it is in Pound Lane.It has 3 snooker tables and one pool table and a dart board. There are eight tennis courts in Burley most of them are gravel ones. The Golf Club is right next to the Cub hut and the Scout hut. The Brownies are near to the house which is called Camden House. This is now a home for old people.Burley football team play matches every Saturday. By David Mc.Dowell.
